means: 散布，传播( disseminate的过去式和过去分词 )

word_mean: 散布的：散布在一定区域的

sentence.Network_cn: 他们散布反对法国的宣传资料。

sentence.Network_en: Their findings have been widely disseminated .
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的研究成果已经广为传播。

sentence.Network_en: Berkovitz had contracted polio after ingesting a vaccine disseminated under federal supervision.
sentence.Network_cn: 伯考维茨在接种了在联邦监督下分发的牛痘疫苗后传染上脊髓灰质炎.

弥散性血管内凝血(Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation,DIC)弥散性血管内凝血是多种原因致弥漫性微血管内血栓形成,继之因凝血因子及血小板被大量消耗及纤维蛋白溶解.

entry.def: To disseminate information or knowledge means to distribute it so that it reaches many people or organizations.

example.ex: It took years to disseminate information about Aids in Africa...
example.tran: 在非洲传播关于艾滋病方面的知识耗时数年。
